title: Hvigor configuration
description: Build configuration and scripts in the DevEco hvigor System.

modelVersion.description: Define the version of the hvigor.

dependencies.description: Define the plugins and dependency libraries used in the build.

execution.description: Define the running mode or capability of the hvigor.

analyze.description: Define the build analyze mode or capability of the hvigor.

daemon.description: Indicate whether to execute the build in daemon mode, which is advised to set this parameter to false for the CI pipeline.

incremental.description: Indicate whether to enable the incremental build capability.

parallel.description: Indicate whether to enable the parallel build capability.

typeCheck.description: Whether to enable type checking for the build script hvigorfile.ts, After this function is enabled, the build efficiency is reduced.

logging.description: Define the log capability of the Hvigor.

level.description: Select the hvigor log level.Logs are less detailed, that is, debug information is the most abundant.

debugging.description: Define the   capability of the Hvigor during task execution.

nodeOptions.description: Define the nodeOptions capability of the Hvigor during task execution.

maxOldSpaceSize.description: Define the max memory size of V8's old memory section.

exposeGC.description: Define the trigger garbage collection explicitly.

properties.description: Define the properties capability of the Hvigor.

hvigor.cacheDir.description: Define the specified storage path for the .hvigor cache folder under the project root directory.

ohos.buildDir.description: Define the storage location for the project's build artifacts directory (build directory).

hvigor.pool.maxSize.description: Define the number of threads to be used during the compilation process.

ohos.pack.compressLevel.description: Define the compression level for packaging .so files. Higher compression levels result in slower compression speeds.

ohos.arkCompile.maxSize.description: Define the maximum number of workers for ArkTS Compiler.

enableSignTask.description: The build tasks does not generate a signed package for HAP or HSP.

hvigor.analyzeHtml.description: The build tasks does not generate a analyze html file.

ohos.compile.lib.entryfile.description: Indicate whether to compile hsp, obfuscated har, and dynamic-import har in hsp/hap from the entrance. Default is false.

ohos.sign.har.description: Indicate whether to generate a signed package for HAR. Default is false.

hvigor.dependency.useNpm.description: Specifies whether to use NPM to download dependencies in hvigor-config.json5. If this function is enabled, NPM is used by default regardless of the current node version.

ohos.align.target.description: all targets in the build context should have the same name or be the default target.

hvigor.enableMemoryCache.description: Define The build tasks use memory cache.
